text: My proyshly svyate pysannya z heneratsiyi do heneratsiyi, ta my dozvolyly whomever my vybraly z chysla nashykh sluzhbovtsiv otrymaty tse. Z·hodom, deyakyy z nykh obrazyly yikhni dushi, inshi upheld tse tilʹky rozdilyayutʹsya chasu, v toy chas, yak inshi buly neterplyachi popratsyuvaty righteousness z·hidno z BOZHYM bude; tse yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh velykyy triumf
